title: The fabrication of robust and highly efficient oil–water separation filters via the high temperature sintering of silica micropower
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,13489-13493
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02534B, Paper
Open Access

Emma Sadler, Colin R. Crick
Superhydrophobic materials have been shown to have many attractive properties, however, their functionality can easily be lost due to the failure of the air layer.
